TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpCookiesSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookiesSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 Web 应用程序所使用的 Cookie 的属性。

span.span: Configures properties for cookies used by a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `httpCookies` 节的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `httpCookies` section of a configuration file. 它定义到应用程序颁发的所有 cookie 应用默认情况下，除非颁发 cookie 该代码重写它们的设置。It defines the settings applied by default to all cookies issued by the application, unless the code issuing the cookie overrides them. 目标之一`httpCookies`元素将以支持使用`HttpOnly`cookie。One objective of the `httpCookies` element is to support the use of `HttpOnly` cookies. `HttpOnly` cookie (cookie 与`HttpOnly`属性) 引入了在 Internet Explorer 6 中来帮助减轻跨站点脚本的风险。`HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting. `HttpOnly`属性可防止 cookie 正在通过客户端脚本访问。The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script. 中包含的任何信息`HttpOnly`cookie 就很难透露给黑客或恶意网站。Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site. 有关详细信息，搜索 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com)"HttpOnly。"For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly." > [!NOTE] > 可以读取和写入信息 from 和 to 按照的部分属性的配置文件的相关节其值是。The can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property whose value is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否启用了浏览器的 Cookie 支持的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the support for the browser's cookie is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了 支持，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if support for the cookie is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `httpCookies`元素支持使用`HttpOnly`cookie。The `httpCookies` element supports the use of `HttpOnly` cookies. `HttpOnly` cookie (cookie 与`HttpOnly`属性) 引入了在 Internet Explorer 6 中来帮助减轻跨站点脚本的风险。`HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting. `HttpOnly`属性可防止 cookie 正在通过客户端脚本访问。The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script. 中包含的任何信息`HttpOnly`cookie 就很难透露给黑客或恶意网站。Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site. 有关详细信息，搜索 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com)"HttpOnly。"For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly." ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property bool RequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否需要安全套接字层 (SSL) 通信的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) communication is required.

value.span: 如果启用了 SSL，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性启用或禁用的安全 cookie 属性 RFC 2109 中所述的输出。The property enables or disables output of the secure cookie attribute as described in RFC 2109. 当使用符合的浏览器，cookie 将仅返回通过使用 SSL/TLS 连接发送。When used by compliant browsers, the cookie will only be sent back over a connection using SSL/TLS. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#3)]
